# TopEdge AI - AI Caller and Chatbot Platform
# Version: 1.0
# Last Updated: 2024-02-20

# Site Description
TopEdge AI is a leading provider of AI-powered caller and chatbot solutions for businesses. Our platform helps automate customer service, generate leads, and provide 24/7 support through intelligent voice and chat interfaces.

# Main Features
- AI Caller: Automated voice calls for lead generation and customer support
- Smart Chatbot: 24/7 customer service automation
- Business Automation: Streamline operations with AI
- Lead Generation: Convert visitors into qualified leads
- Multi-channel Support: Voice, chat, and messaging integration

# Primary Keywords
ai-caller
ai-chatbot
business-automation
virtual-assistant
ai-customer-service
chatbot-agency
ai-agency
lead-generation
24-7-support
voice-bot

# Content Categories
/features - Product features and capabilities
/pricing - Pricing plans and packages
/blog - Industry insights and updates
/about - Company information
/contact - Get in touch

# Preferred Crawling Schedule
Crawl-delay: 1
Update-frequency: daily

# Content Guidelines
- Focus on AI technology and business automation
- Highlight customer success stories
- Provide detailed product information
- Share industry insights and trends
